title: FS: 1888 Yum Yum Tobacco N403 Mark Baldwin / Billy Sunday

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 Yum Yum Tobacco N403 Mark Baldwin / Billy Sunday
posts.post_content:
I had this up a while back, but we were hit with a family tragedy, so now I'm just getting back to it with an aggressive price drop.  $1,300 shipped takes it.

Here is an article I've written about it - SUPER fascinating stuff! 
 [url]https://tanmanbaseballfan.com/2022/01/1888-yum-yum-tobacco-the-19th-century-evangelist-the-pirate.html[/url]
